channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Growing mangoes in Greece is the latest bizarre climate change experiment as droughts become the norm
item.description: Olives, watermelon and lettuce are being replaced by mangoes, avocados and macadamia nuts.

item.title: Harris responds to Trump Fed comments, will release economic plan in coming days
item.description: Kamala Harris could not "disagree more" with Donald Trump's belief that the president deserves a say in the Federal Reserve's monetary policy decisions.

item.title: FDA rejects psychedelic MDMA as treatment for PTSD, calling for additional study
See what Google’s original office looked like when it started in Susan Wojcicki’s garage
item.description: "As long as you guys pay your rent on time, you guys can build your Googly thing here," Susan Wojcicki recalled telling Larry Page and Sergey Brin in 1998.

item.title: Harris leads Trump in three major election battlegrounds, new poll finds
item.description: Kamala Harris has gained polling ground against Donald Trump ever since President Joe Biden dropped out of the election.

item.title: Why Fed interest-rate cuts aren’t always good for stocks
Kamala Harris vows not to interfere with the Fed—unlike Trump
item.description: “The Fed is an independent entity, and as president, I would never interfere in the decisions that the Fed makes."

item.title: Disney is hoping for a box office rebound built on sequels, prequels and pixie dust
item.description: As Disney seeks to rebuild its reputation and recapture magic at the box office, it is relying heavily on existing, and beloved, franchises.

item.title: The next big work perk? Getting your Amazon packages at the office.
Even an uptick in inflation is unlikely to spoil a Fed rate cut in September
item.description: The consumer price index on Wednesday is expected to have risen 0.2% from June for both the headline figure and the so-called core gauge that excludes food and energy.

item.title: Tim Walz vs. JD Vance: What the 2024 presidential running mates could mean for your wallet
item.description: Here's how Gov. Tim Walz and Sen. JD Vance compare on key personal finance issues like housing, the child tax credit and student loans.

item.title: Hard or soft landing? Music fans say ‘recession pop’ may hold clues on economy.
Argentina’s economic shock therapy and fintech boom are wiping out peso notes
item.description: All tangible signs suggest the reign of peso banknotes is ending.

item.title: Former YouTube CEO and Silicon Valley trailblazer Susan Wojcicki has died at age 56
item.description: The former YouTube CEO stepped down last year.

item.title: U.S. stocks slash selloff losses as Wall Street wraps wild week
